local_intent: Ensure white_plate is visible, approach and align, execute Pick using white_plate_grasp, verify stability; retry pick up to 2 times if needed.
assumptions: white_plate_grasp was produced earlier and is available on the blackboard
white_plate remains at the computed pose and is reachable
no new obstacles block approach or grasp
coherence_with_global: Replaces the Pick leaf in the global Sequence; uses the previously computed white_plate_grasp, aligns, performs pick, and verifies IsGraspStable consistent with the global plan.
